title: 50% - 50% Weekly Reward pool for EDOGE and upcoming child tokens based on SMRAT and EDOGE holder percentage
body:
Upcoming child tokens Weekly Reward pool needs to be calculated based on SMRAT Holdings precentage AND EDOGE (or any other new token) holdings percentage by 50% each and if user is VIP then +20% additional to the final amount. 
The reason is that if only SMRAT holdings is calculated by 100% then passive income investors do not have strong reason to buy new tokens. Instant reward itself may not be enough. That could cause small new tokens failure and thus SMRAT holders will not earn any Weekly rewards at all from child tokens. 

My proposition is that EDOGE Weekly Reward calculation needs to be:

EDOGE Weekly Reward = (Child token Reward POOL * SMRAT holding % * 50) + (Child token Reward * EDOGE holding % * 50%)

EXAMPLE

If a user holds 0,1% of the SMRAT Total Supply and 0,2% of EDOGE Total Supply and the Reward Pool is 20.000 DOGE then:

Weekly reward = (20.000 doge x 50% x 0,1%) + (20.000 doge x 50% x 0,1%) =30 Doge 

- if user is VIP (holds 80B SMRAT) then +20% so insted of 30 Doge he will receive 36 Doge!

This change will make more people invest in child tokens and full the ecosystem with successful and alive new tokens which will attract new investors who will buy also SMRAT!
author: 0x160D3CE5a50973Ba50ca19e43505A1457CBF4fd4
